message: The CLASS_SYSTEM field for indicator 8-9-1, translated into all languages

data.en: The methodology for the calculation of Tourism Direct GDP is in line with the Tourism Satellite Account: Recommended Methodological Framework (TSA:RMF 2008) and the International Recommendations for Tourism Statistics 2008 (IRTS 2008) which defines the tourism characteristic industries (i.e. tourism industries) and provides a list of tourism industries for international comparability purposes based on the International Standard Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC Rev. 4)
